name: RoyalsFanTrivia
0:
”Alexa, open royals fan trivia”
”Alexa, start royals fan trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: royals fan trivia
des:
Royals fan trivia was amassed by a long time avid fan of Major League Baseball. This skill is fun to play during the long winter months when there is no baseball and you long to hear “Play Ball”. Or before or after the game while at home or in the car.

Royals Fan trivia is great for the entire family. Play by yourself or against others to see who really knows their Nationals.

New trivia is constantly being added to the skill so keep coming back and playing.

If you have questions, comments or a favorite trivia you want to see added to this game please let us know: skills@dwilsys.com.

This skill is not sponsored nor endorsed by Major League Baseball the Kansas City Royals or its affiliates. This is a fan created game. All trademarks belong to the respective owners.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
